about.name: Shweta Pandey
about.title: PhD Student, Indian Institute of Science (IISc)
about.bio: I am a PhD student at IISc, working on high-performance storage systems and data management. My research interests include storage engines, databases, and systems performance.

publications.title: H-Rocks: High-Performance RocksDB for Hybrid Storage

experience.description: Research in storage systems, databases, and performance studies.

talks.title: Invited Talk: Storage Systems for Hybrid Workloads

news.text: Our paper on H-Rocks accepted at SIGMOD 2025!

projects.name: H-Rocks
projects.description: A performance-optimized version of RocksDB for hybrid storage.
